description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dive into the Inferno and take a journey on an intense twin-stick adventure.  Explore 30 levels, collect gold, upgrade your ship, and destroy everything in your path.  Inferno is the third game in the radiangames series.
description.short: Dive into the Inferno and take a journey on an intense twin-stick adventure.  Explore 30 levels, collect gold, upgrade your ship, and destroy everything in your path.  Inferno is the third game in the radiangames series.
